amendment.description: To improve consumer notification of numerical credit scores used in certain lending transactions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4016 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4016 proposed by Senator Udall CO to Amendment SA 3739. (consideration: CR S3772-3774; text: CR S3772) To improve consumer notification of numerical credit scores used in certain lending transactions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4016 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4016 proposed by Senator Udall CO to Amendment SA 3739.
